text: Lisa LaTrelle Blunt Rochester (n√©e Blunt; February 10, 1962) is an American politician who is the junior United States Senator from Delaware since 2025. She was the U.S. Representative for from 2017 to 2025. She is a member of the Democratic Party. In June 2023, Blunt Rochester announced her candidacy for the United States Senate in the 2024 election to replace Tom Carper. She won the election in November 2024. She is the first woman and person of color to represent Delaware in the Senate. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:African-American politicians Category:United States representatives from Delaware Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Delaware
title: Lisa Blunt Rochester
